ygData.subject: Re: Market in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I hope Verant *never* implements any sort of item degredation system.  It would definitely *not* be fun; especially with the camp lengths you have to
ygData.messageBody:
--- velom@... wrote:
> Has anyone thought of or actually talked to Verant
> about having armor wear out? ...
> I don't know if this seems like a good idea or not.
> I think it does. Let me know what you all think of
> this idea.

I hope Verant *never* implements any sort of item
degredation system. It would definitely *not* be fun;
especially with the camp lengths you have to endure
for some highly choice items (PGT comes to mind, as
does Rubicite, or holyswords, etc...).

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
